privacy.privacyCont2:
We collect personal information of persons that have accounts in barfitter.biz service. A person registering restaurant may add personal information of other persons. Examples of what we collect:
- name and surname
- email
- address
Everyone can change or remove its personal information.
Barfitter.biz service also collects sales data.
privacy.privacyCont3: We employ other  individuals to perform functions on our behalf. Examples include sending postal mail and e-mail, removing repetitive information from customer lists, analysing data, providing marketing assistance, providing search results and links (including paid listings and links), processing payments, transmitting content, hosting providing, programming support and providing customer service. These third party service providers have access to personal information needed to perform their functions, but may not use it for other purposes. Further, they must process the personal information in accordance with this Privacy Notice and as permitted by applicable data protection laws.
privacy.privacyCont5: We use cookies and other technologies to recognise your browser or device, and provide you with essential features and services and for additional purposes, including:
privacy.privacyCont6:
• Recognising you when you sign-in to use our service.
  • Keeping track of your specified preferences. This allows us to honour your likes and dislikes, such as whether or not you would like to see interest-based ads.
  • Preventing fraudulent activity.
  • Improving security.
  • Delivering content, including ads, relevant to your interests.
  • Reporting. This allows us to measure and analyse the performance of our services.
privacy.privacyCont7: You can manage browser cookies through your browser settings. The 'Help' feature on most browsers will tell you how to prevent your browser from accepting new cookies, how to have the browser notify you when you receive a new cookie, how to disable cookies, and when cookies will expire.
